title: New UK Defence Minister In Ukraine On 1st Trip Abroad, Pledges More Support
content: The UK's new defence minister pledged on Sunday to deliver more artillery guns, ammunition and missiles to Ukraine, stressing London's ongoing support for Kyiv during a visit to the southern city of Odesa.
summary: The UK's new defence minister pledged on Sunday to deliver more artillery guns, ammunition and missiles to Ukraine, stressing London's ongoing support for Kyiv during a visit to the southern city of Odesa.

title: France Left-Wing Ahead Of Macron Alliance, Far Right In Poll: Projections
content: A broad left-wing coalition was leading a tight French legislative election Sunday, ahead of both President Emmanuel Macron's centrists and the far right with no group winning an absolute majority, projections showed.
summary: A broad left-wing coalition was leading a tight French legislative election Sunday, ahead of both President Emmanuel Macron's centrists and the far right with no group winning an absolute majority, projections showed.

title: Gaza Deal Must Let Israel Resume Fighting Until War Goals Met: Netanyahu
content: Any Gaza ceasefire deal must allow Israel to resume fighting until its objectives are met, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday, as talks over a U.S. plan aimed at ending the nine-month-old war were expected to restart.
summary: Any Gaza ceasefire deal must allow Israel to resume fighting until its objectives are met, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday, as talks over a U.S. plan aimed at ending the nine-month-old war were expected to restart.

title: Israeli Strike On School Sheltering Gazans Kills 4, 2nd Attack In 2 Days
content: The civil defence agency in Hamas-run Gaza said a strike Sunday on a school sheltering displaced Palestinians killed at least four people, the second such Israeli attack in two days.
summary: The civil defence agency in Hamas-run Gaza said a strike Sunday on a school sheltering displaced Palestinians killed at least four people, the second such Israeli attack in two days.

title: Ready To Discuss Hostage Deal Without "Permanent" Ceasefire: Hamas Official
content: A Hamas official said Sunday the Palestinian group was ready to discuss a hostage release deal with Israel even without a "complete" ceasefire..
summary: A Hamas official said Sunday the Palestinian group was ready to discuss a hostage release deal with Israel even without a "complete" ceasefire..

title: In 1st Call With Netanyahu, UK PM Urges "Caution" On Israel-Lebanon Border
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday called on all sides to exercise "caution" on the border between Israel and Lebanon, in his first telephone conversation since he was elected with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday called on all sides to exercise "caution" on the border between Israel and Lebanon, in his first telephone conversation since he was elected with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: Biden Back On Election Campaign Trail As Pressure From Democrats Mounts
content: Embattled US President Joe Biden sought out safe ground Sunday, courting Black voters at a church as he hit the campaign trail to salvage his reelection bid and silence growing calls to quit.
summary: Embattled US President Joe Biden sought out safe ground Sunday, courting Black voters at a church as he hit the campaign trail to salvage his reelection bid and silence growing calls to quit.

title: Keir Starmer Seeks "Immediate Reset" With UK Nations Post Poll Victory
content: Newly-elected Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday began a whistlestop tour of UK nations, promising an "immediate reset" of relations with the devolved governments of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
summary: Newly-elected Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday began a whistlestop tour of UK nations, promising an "immediate reset" of relations with the devolved governments of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

title: Hamas Says It Is Waiting For Israel's Response On Gaza Ceasefire Proposal
content: Hamas is waiting for a response from Israel on its ceasefire proposal, two officials from the Palestinian group said on Sunday, five days after it accepted a key part of a U.S. plan aimed at ending the nine-month-old war in Gaza.
summary: Hamas is waiting for a response from Israel on its ceasefire proposal, two officials from the Palestinian group said on Sunday, five days after it accepted a key part of a U.S. plan aimed at ending the nine-month-old war in Gaza.

title: Lyft Driver Urinated In Container Mid-Ride, US Woman Claims In Lawsuit
content: The woman has alleged that the incident left her shocked, angry, and caused lasting depression along with other psychological and emotional distress.
summary: The woman has alleged that the incident left her shocked, angry, and caused lasting depression along with other psychological and emotional distress.

title: Chinese Premier Congratulates New UK PM, Says "Willing To Work": Report
content: Chinese Premier Li Qiang on Sunday congratulated new British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on his election, state media reported, the first senior leader in Beijing to do so publicly.
summary: Chinese Premier Li Qiang on Sunday congratulated new British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on his election, state media reported, the first senior leader in Beijing to do so publicly.

title: "Very Significant": Indian Envoy On PM Modi's Visit To Russia
content: India's Ambassador to Russia, Vinay Kumar, has called Prime Minister Narendra Modi's upcoming visit to Russia "very significant" and noted that it is taking place after a gap of three years.
summary: India's Ambassador to Russia, Vinay Kumar, has called Prime Minister Narendra Modi's upcoming visit to Russia "very significant" and noted that it is taking place after a gap of three years.

title: Deadly Gaza Battles, Hezbollah Rockets As War Enters 10th Month
content: Israel carried out deadly air strikes in the Gaza Strip on Sunday as the war entered its 10th month, with fighting raging across the Palestinian territory and fresh diplomatic efforts underway to halt the violence.
summary: Israel carried out deadly air strikes in the Gaza Strip on Sunday as the war entered its 10th month, with fighting raging across the Palestinian territory and fresh diplomatic efforts underway to halt the violence.

title: Overnight Ukraine Drone Hit Sets Russian Munitions Depot Ablaze
content: An overnight Ukrainian drone attack set a Russian munitions depot ablaze the Voronezh region, near the two countries' shared border, Russian and Ukrainian officials said Sunday.
summary: An overnight Ukrainian drone attack set a Russian munitions depot ablaze the Voronezh region, near the two countries' shared border, Russian and Ukrainian officials said Sunday.

title: Need Plan To Control Immigration: Ex UK PM Blair's Advice To Keir Starmer
content: Former Labour prime minister Tony Blair made an early intervention in British politics on Sunday after Keir Starmer's landslide election victory, urging him to have a "plan to control immigration".
summary: Former Labour prime minister Tony Blair made an early intervention in British politics on Sunday after Keir Starmer's landslide election victory, urging him to have a "plan to control immigration".

title: Could Kamala Harris Beat Trump In US Presidential Race? Polls Suggest...
content: She worries Republican donors, has name recognition, and Democratic Party heavyweights are beginning to line up behind her.
summary: She worries Republican donors, has name recognition, and Democratic Party heavyweights are beginning to line up behind her.

title: All Is Not Well Between Prince Harry And Meghan Markle? Expert Says...
content: All is not well between Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.
summary: All is not well between Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

title: Elephants Go Out Of Control At Lanka Festival, Pilgrims Flee; 13 Injured
content: A Hindu religious festival in Sri Lanka ended in chaos after an elephant in the procession panicked, with 13 people in the crowd injured as they fled, police said Sunday.
summary: A Hindu religious festival in Sri Lanka ended in chaos after an elephant in the procession panicked, with 13 people in the crowd injured as they fled, police said Sunday.

title: France Votes In Large Numbers In High-Stakes Poll As Far Right Eyes Power
content: The mood in the country is tense, with 30,000 police deployed to head off trouble and voters anxious about a potential electoral earthquake shifting the French political landscape.
summary: The mood in the country is tense, with 30,000 police deployed to head off trouble and voters anxious about a potential electoral earthquake shifting the French political landscape.

title: "Democracy Not In Good Health": Pope Francis' Warning To "Populists"
content: Pope Francis decried the state of democracy and warned against "populists" during a short visit to Trieste in Italy's northeast on Sunday ahead of a 12-day trip to Asia -- the longest of his papacy.
summary: Pope Francis decried the state of democracy and warned against "populists" during a short visit to Trieste in Italy's northeast on Sunday ahead of a 12-day trip to Asia -- the longest of his papacy.
